conflict: Tell me about a time you solved a conflict.
Tell me about a time you disagreed with a technical decision.
Tell me about a time stakeholders disagreed on priorities.
Tell me about a time you dealt with conflict between teams.
Tell me about a time you worked with a difficult colleague.
Tell me about a time you disagreed with your manager.
failure: Tell me about the biggest mistake you made at work.
Tell me about a time you missed a deadline.
Tell me about a time you caused a production issue.
Tell me about a time you made a wrong technical decision.
Tell me about a time miscommunication caused problems.
Tell me about a time you underestimated a project.
execution: Tell me about your most challenging project.
Tell me about a time you had to meet a tight deadline.
Tell me about a time you delivered with unclear requirements.
Tell me about a time you delivered with limited resources.
Tell me about a time you worked with a legacy system.
Tell me about a time you coordinated across multiple teams.
problem_solving: Tell me about a time when you had to dive deep to understand a problem.
Tell me about the hardest bug you had to debug.
Tell me about a complex system you designed.
Tell me about a time you optimized a system.
Tell me about a time you used data to make a decision.
Tell me about a difficult trade-off you had to make.
growth: Tell me about a time when you received negative feedback.
Tell me about a time you worked outside your comfort zone.
Tell me about a time you had to learn something quickly.
Tell me about a mentor who influenced you.
Tell me about a time you adapted to change.
ambiguity: Tell me about a time you worked with unclear requirements.
Tell me about a time you solved a novel problem.
Tell me about a time you dealt with changing priorities.
Tell me about a time you stepped up when ownership was unclear.
Tell me about a time you decided with incomplete information.
leadership: Tell me about a time you mentored someone.
Tell me about a time you drove an initiative.
Tell me about a time you influenced a decision.
Tell me about a time you built consensus.
Tell me about a time you raised the bar for your team.
Tell me about a time you led through a crisis.
teamwork: Tell me about working with a cross-functional team.
Tell me about collaborating across time zones.
Tell me about a time you supported a teammate.
Tell me about a time you shared knowledge with your team.
Tell me about a time you gave difficult feedback to a peer.
Tell me about a time you unblocked a teammate.
ownership: Tell me about a time you took initiative.
Tell me about a time you owned something end-to-end.
Tell me about a time you took responsibility for a failure.
Tell me about a time you went beyond your job description.
Tell me about a time you prioritized long-term over short-term.
Tell me about a time you anticipated a problem.
